Changelog
---------

++++++++++++++++++

* Try to guess git config items data type
  (fix passing port to paramiko)

++++++++++++++++++

0.1.0 (2012-11-18)
++++++++++++++++++

* git-media ported to Python and renamed git-bigfile
* Refactoring
* First public release
